original_text: If, in fact, Abraham was justified by works, he had something to boast about—but not before God.
korean_text: 만일 아브라함이 행위로써 의롭다 하심을 받았으면 자랑할 것이 있으려니와 하나님 앞에서는 없느니라

sentences.original_text: If, in fact, Abraham was justified by works
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 사실 아브라함이 행위로 의롭다 하심을 얻었다면

sentences.original_text: he had something to boast about
